title: Pop Mart, Xiaomi Expand Share Buyback Wave as Stocks Waver
description: Some of the biggest Chinese firms listed in Hong Kong are busy buying back their own shares, seeking to shore up investor confidence in their cooling stock prices.
content: Some of the biggest Chinese firms listed in Hong Kong are busy buying back their own shares, seeking to shore up investor confidence in their cooling stock prices.
